name: Druidic Focus
description: A Druidic Focus is a special item designed to channel the power of primal spells. A Druid or Ranger can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.

variants.name: Sprig of Mistletoe
variants.description: A sprig of sacred mistletoe used to channel primal magic.

variants.name: Totem
variants.description: A small carved or painted figurine representing a nature spirit or animal.

variants.name: Wooden Staff
variants.description: A wooden staff carved from a living tree, used to channel primal magic.

variants.name: Yew Wand
variants.description: A slender wand crafted from yew wood, used to channel primal magic.
